attachments.title: Apple Macbook Air 11.6-inch 1.4 GHz/ 2GB/ 64GB (refurb) $499 shipped, MacBook w/Superdrive: $399
attachments.text:
Today’s Daily Steal is the refurbished 11.6-inch Macbook Air for only $499 shipped. That’s $500 off the original list price, $415 less than Amazon, and the lowest we’ve seen for the 2012 model.
“This Macbook is powered by a 1.4 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo processor and has 2GB of onboard 1066MHz DDR3 RAM. Graphics are provided by integrated nVIDIA GeForce 320M GPU with 256MB of shared DDR3 SDRAM. You also get all the amenities you would expect from a Mac — a FaceTime webcam, 802.11n Airport Extreme Wi-Fi, Bluetooth 2.1+EDR and built-in stereo speakers.”
We also found at Daily Steals the 13.3-Inch MacBook with a 250GB Hard Drive and DVD Superdrive refurb for only $399 shipped (orig. $799)
More from Apple about these items:

The 11.6″ MacBook Air is an ultraportable notebook computer with a thin and lightweight design. The system is loaded with 64GB of flash storage rather than an old-fashioned hard drive. It also allows for impressive battery life — up to 9 hours of web browsing and 30 days of standby time. The computer is powered by a 1.4 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo processor and has 2GB of onboard 1066MHz DDR3 RAM. Graphics are provided by integrated nVIDIA GeForce 320M GPU with 256MB of shared DDR3 SDRAM. The computer features all the amenities you expect on a Mac — a FaceTime webcam, 802.11n Airport Extreme Wi-Fi, Bluetooth 2.1+EDR and built-in stereo speakers.

Powered by a 1.4 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo processor
11.6-inch LED-backlit glossy widescreen display (1366 x 768)
64 GB flash memory storage
2 GB installed RAM
Integrated nVIDIA GeForce 320M GPU
Built-in HD 720p FaceTime camera for video chatting
Full-sized backlit keyboard
Wi-Fi 802.11n Airport Extreme
Bluetooth 2.1+EDR for connecting with peripherals such as keyboards, mice and cell phones
Built-in stereo speakers along with omnidirectional microphone, headphone mini jack
Mac OS X 10.7 Lion (64-bit) operating system


Condition: Refurbished | Packaging: Box | Warranty: 90 Days | Brand: Apple | Model: MD505LL/A | 

What You Get:

Apple MacBook Air MD505LL/A 11.6-Inch Laptop
Charger
